body: Always the same shit, anyway he probably never makes her cum, no wonder he didn't get it.

well i don't care about slut go back to being slut. it's just i hate mc's in these ntr's, they are always clueless. they'll even take care of those hoes until her death and even rise others children. with a smile of course. -_-

Lol boyfriend fucked her so he can’t be a virgin you dummy. The boyfriend is stupid though he should atleast know what her voice sounds like. Plus if he called her he would probably hear the phone ring on the other side of the wall.
Same shit different skin.  NTR is recycled shit and piss.  And imagine supporting an NTR artist. LUL.  No thanks, they already are a disappointment.

Why would he say he learnt something from the bf just before he started to blackmail her? Is the bf doing some shady shizz?

Wow, I’m just amazed how lazy this NTR was. I’m a big follower of the genre but this one was so boring. The author spent who knows how much time drawing and writing this story over 30 pages, for it to be so painfully cliche.
the girl should've just ignored her senpai and stayed with her boyfriend
sigh* another trash NTR. i wish Authors would get creative and get the MC more involved to either find out and move on or get their GF back. let that become the  " the same shit ever"
